name: Choose Your Own 2020
description:
Made for my CSUMB Senior Capstone project, take a trip back into the worst year on record, and do your best to make it all a little better!

Re-Experience the exhausting nightmare of 2020, but this time, you have the power make it go a little smoother!  Can you make it through all four stories?  Or will you be like the rest of us?  Trapped in an endless cycle of social media, television, and nightmarish food runs until the end of time.

Only one way to find out!
